meanings.definition: Flimsy or frail in structure or substance.
meanings.sent1: The slimsy paper tore easily in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The slimsy tent collapsed under the weight of the snow.
meanings.sent3: The slimsy umbrella flipped inside out in the storm.
meanings.sent4: Her slimsy excuses for being late were transparent to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The slimsy bridge swayed dangerously as we crossed.

meanings.sent1: The slimsy chair wobbled as he sat down.
meanings.sent2: The slimsy rope snapped under the weight of the package.
meanings.sent3: The slimsy ladder creaked ominously as he climbed.
meanings.sent4: His slimsy arguments fell apart under scrutiny.
meanings.sent5: The slimsy floorboards groaned with each step.

meanings.sent1: The slimsy vase shattered when it fell off the table.
meanings.sent2: The slimsy glass cracked with the slightest pressure.
meanings.sent3: The slimsy toy car fell apart after just a few uses.
meanings.sent4: Her slimsy necklace broke as soon as she put it on.
meanings.sent5: The slimsy phone screen scratched easily.
